# 3D Animation Portfolio Website

## Project Overview
A modern 3D animation portfolio website built with Vite and Three.js, featuring interactive 3D elements, smooth animations, and a responsive design.

## Tech Stack
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **3D Graphics**: Three.js
- **Animations**: GSAP (GreenSock Animation Platform)
- **Styling**: CSS3 with custom properties

## Project Structure
```
├── index.html          # Main HTML entry point
├── src/
│   ├── main.js         # Main JavaScript entry
│   ├── style.css       # Global styles
│   ├── three-scene.js  # Three.js scene setup
│   └── animations.js   # GSAP animations
├── public/
│   └── assets/         # Static assets
└── package.json        # Dependencies
```

## Development Commands
- `npm install` - Install dependencies
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
